mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM `cs` a JOIN `cs_cate` AS b ON a.cate = b.cateNo
ORDER BY a.cno DESC LIMIT #{start},10

SELECT a.`cno` AS cno, a.`group` AS `group`, a.`cate` AS cate, a.`title` AS title, a.`content` AS content, a.`registant` AS registant, a.`regip` AS regip, a.`rdate` AS rdate, a.`beginDate` AS beginDate, a.`period` AS period, a.`status` AS status FROM `cs` AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.`group` = 'notice' LIMIT #{pg}, 10

SELECT a.`cno` AS cno, a.`group` AS `group`, a.`cate` AS cate, a.`title` AS title, a.`content` AS content, a.`registant` AS registant, a.`regip` AS regip, a.`rdate` AS rdate, a.`beginDate` AS beginDate, a.`period` AS period, a.`status` AS status FROM `cs` AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.`group` = 'faq' LIMIT #{pg}, 10
SELECT a.`cateNo` AS cateNo, a.`cateName` AS cateName FROM `cs_cate` AS a

SELECT a.`cno` AS cno, a.`group` AS `group`, a.`cate` AS cate, a.`title` AS title, a.`content` AS content, a.`registant` AS registant, a.`regip` AS regip, a.`rdate` AS rdate, a.`beginDate` AS beginDate, a.`period` AS period, a.`status` AS status, b.`cateName` AS cateName FROM `cs` AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN `cs_cate` AS b ON a.`cate` = b.`cateNo` WHERE a.`cno` = ${cno}
